p:
The instantaneous per capita infection rate for individual i with subtype s is denoted λ
i, s ( t). An individual’s overall rate of infection with subtype s comprises a rate of infection from the community, λ community, i, s , and another from the household, λ household, i, s ,
6
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$\lambda _{i,s}(t) = \lambda _{{\mathrm{community}},i,s}(t) + \lambda _{{\mathrm{household}},i,s}(t).$$\end{document}
